title: I have to re patch
body: Hi, I opened the client and it said something like "we had to put another version now we will start the new patch download". My internet is very slow and the other day it took me quite some time to download the new patch, please help and sorry for my bad english. Thank you.

replies.body: Is this continuously happening, or did it only happen this once? This message typically pops up if something went wrong with the last attempt to patch, but shouldn't happen as a regular thing. If this is still happening, please let me know. ^.^
Hi it happened only one time. Sorry for the late reply and thank you :) <3
